title: Riches of the earth
creator_credit: Barry Helmer, Sidney Goldsmith, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Colourful animation illustrates how Canada’s underground resources took shape through geological ages, and how theses riches of the earth have become our raw materials. We see the formation, by fire, water, wind and ice, of the earth’s crust, with its wealth of minerals, coal, arable land and water.
